doc.field: -Finding a Thread in a Haystack, reviews by Wendy Perron and others, January 22nd, 1976 -Of Baggage, Short Stories, and Reflections, reviews by Wendy Perron and others, January 29th, 1976 -Followable Dancing, review of Mary Overlie and David Gordon, by Wendy Perron, March 4th, 1976 -Energy Sparks, review of Wendy Rogers, by Wendy Perron, March 11th, 1976 -Performance Diary, by Peter Frank, April 1st, 1976 (incomplete article) -Unadorned, review of Suzanne Harris, by Wendy Perron, April 8th, 1976 -People Improvisation, review of Grand Union, by Wendy Perron, May 6th, 1976 -New Dimensions in Self-Consciousness, review of Michael McClard, by Wendy Perron, May 20th, 1976 -Small Night Music in a Fog, Review of Yoshimasa Wada, by Peter Zummo, May 27th, 1976 -Undiscovered: Bill Horowitz, review of Bill Horowitz, by Wendy Perron, May 27th, 1976 -Keeping in Line, review of Philip Glass, Dickie Landry, Andy DeGroat, by Sally Banes, June 3rd, 1976 -The Ceremony of Leonard Crow Dog, reviews of Leonard Crow Dog, June 10th, 1976 -Unpremeditated Honesty, review by Wendy Perron, June 10th, 1976 -Consuming Determination, review of Lucinda Childs, by Wendy Perron, June 17th, 1976 -It All Depends on How You Define It, review of Wendy Perron, by Robert J. Pierce, June 17th, 1976 -Death or Rebirth, review of Julie Hymen, by Mark Savitt, July 1st, 1976 -Discovery, review of Tony Azito, by Wendy Perron, July 1st, 1976 -Letters, response by John Malpede to Perron's June 10th review, July 1st, 1976 -When Is a Recital Not? review of U.S. Terpsichore, by Robert J. Pierce, July 8th, 1976 -Secret Life of Cities Surrealistic Baedekers, Review of Meredith Monk and Ping Chong, July 8th, 1976 -Downtown Exiles, review of Tony Kushner, et al. by Stephanie Woodward, September 30th, 1976 -Live and Non-Live; Motion and Stillness, review of Sylvia Whitman, by Wendy Perron, Nov. 25th, 1976 -Three Angles on a Three Part Structure, review of Michael Kirby, by Wendy Perron, Dec. 2nd, 1976 -Roots and Rituals, review of Geoff Hendricks, by Sally Banes, December 9th, 1976 -Backworks, review of Barbara Moore and Jon Hendricks, by Wendy Perron, Dec. 9th, 1976 -Older is Better, review of Merce Cunningham, by Wendy Perron, December 16th, 1976 -Transmission From Space, Review of Earth, Moon, Mars, and Jupiter, by Peter Zummo, Dec. 23rd, 1976 -Exporting SoHo, by Wendy Perron, December 30th, 1976
